title: Hunt the Hilichurls
description: Hilichurls are the most common enemies in Teyvat. They are weak but can be dangerous in large numbers. Eliminate 20 Hilichurls in any region.

title: Defeat the Abyss Mages
description: Abyss Mages are powerful elemental foes that can shield themselves and summon minions. Break their shields and strike them down. Defeat 5 Abyss Mages of any element.

title: Slay the Ruin Guards
description: Ruin Guards are ancient machines that guard the secrets of the past. They are heavily armored and can launch missiles from afar. Find their weak spots and destroy them. Slay 3 Ruin Guards in any region.

title: Challenge the Fatui Skirmishers
description: Fatui Skirmishers are elite agents of the Fatui, a hostile foreign power. They have various elemental abilities and can buff their allies. Fight them with caution. Challenge 10 Fatui Skirmishers of any type.

title: Conquer the Oceanid
description: The Oceanid is a formidable hydro boss that can summon different water creatures to attack. It is immune to physical damage and can only be harmed by elemental reactions. Conquer the Oceanid in the Qingce Village.

title: Destroy the Ruin Hunters
description: Ruin Hunters are upgraded versions of Ruin Guards. They are faster, stronger, and can fly. Use ranged attacks or elemental skills to bring them down. Destroy 2 Ruin Hunters in any region.

title: Eliminate the Geovishaps
description: Geovishaps are fierce geo creatures that can burrow underground and ambush their prey. They are resistant to physical damage and can change their element. Eliminate 4 Geovishaps of any element.

title: Fight the Primo Geovishap
description: The Primo Geovishap is the king of the Geovishaps. It is a massive geo beast that can unleash powerful attacks and switch between different elements. Fight the Primo Geovishap in the Tianqiu Valley.

title: Defeat the Regisvines
description: Regisvines are giant elemental plants that can deal massive damage with their vines and bursts. They have a core that is their weak point. Defeat 3 Regisvines of any element.

title: Confront the Hypostases
description: Hypostases are pure elemental entities that can manipulate their shape and form. They have a core that is their weak point. Confront 3 Hypostases of any element.

title: Challenge the Electro Hypostasis
description: The Electro Hypostasis is a special type of Hypostasis that can summon prisms and cubes to attack. It can also heal itself by absorbing electro energy. Challenge the Electro Hypostasis in the Cape Oath.

title: Slay the Stormterror
description: Stormterror is a corrupted dragon that has been spreading chaos in Mondstadt. It can fly and unleash devastating attacks. Slay the Stormterror in its lair.

title: Conquer the Childe
description: Childe is a Fatui Harbinger and a formidable foe. He can wield different elements and transform into a monstrous form. Conquer the Childe in the Golden House.

title: Defeat the Wolf of the North
description: The Wolf of the North is a legendary wolf that lives in the snowy mountains. It is loyal to its master, Razor, and will not hesitate to attack anyone who threatens him. Defeat the Wolf of the North in the Wolvendom.

title: Fight the Dragonspine Bosses
description: Dragonspine is a frozen mountain that harbors many dangers and secrets. There are three powerful bosses that guard the ancient ruins: the Frostarm Lawachurl, the Cryo Regisvine, and the Ancient Ruin Grader. Fight them all and claim their treasures.
